description: InfraHire is looking for Assistant Payroll Accountant in Los Angeles, CA. Process weekly or biweekly payrolls, including garnishments, benefits and taxes to consistent with federal and state wage and hour laws; Ensures the processing of new hires, temporary workers, transfers, promotions and terminations is accurate and timely; Prepares and audits W 4s, payroll balance sheets, YTD earnings, etc.; Ensures systems are set up and updated to reflect our current employee base, including wages, benefits, sick and vacation time in line with agreement (union and non union); Manages regular preparation of relevant management reports, including weekly, monthly, quarterly and year end reports (gross payroll, hours worked, vacation accrual, tax deductions, benefits deductions, etc.); Manages payroll or insurance audits, tax audits, and other audits as necessary; Manages payroll taxes payment weekly with State and Federal; Prepare quarterly and yearly Payroll tax filing with State and Federal; Reconcile banks; Maintains employee benefits programs and informs employees benefits by studying and assessing benefit needs and trends; recommending benefit programs to management; directing the processing of benefit claims; obtaining and evaluating benefit contract bids; awarding benefit contracts; designing and conducting educational programs on benefit programs. InfraHire is an Equal Opportunity Employers.
